items.topic: IP102 Pest Classification with CLIP and Qwen
items.description: Implemented zero-shot and fine-tuned pest classification using CLIP and Qwen-2.5-VL on the IP102 dataset. Developed modular training and evaluation pipelines with custom loss functions and automated reporting of classification metrics and confusion matrices.
Built a high-performance Text2SQL agent combining RAG, ReAct-style planning, and multi-agent coordination to convert natural language into executable SQL.
Building a semi-automated system for generating review papers using Django, Ollama, and LLMs. The pipeline handles research aggregation, draft generation, and refinement.

items.topic: Domain-Specific NLP and LLM Fine-Tuning for RAG Pipelines
items.description: Developed NLP pipelines with Named Entity Recognition (NER), and implemented various LLM fine-tuning techniques (full fine-tuning, soft prompting, adapters, and LoRA) to improve performance on domain-specific retrieval-augmented generation tasks.

Implemented multiple LLM fine-tuning strategies including full fine-tuning, soft prompting, adapters, and LoRA. Evaluated each methodâ€™s effectiveness on custom NLP tasks for domain-specific applications.
Designed and deployed end-to-end RAG pipelines incorporating Named Entity Recognition (NER) and semantic search to enhance information retrieval for question-answering systems in specialized domains.

items.topic: Web-Based Storehouse Management System for I4 Lab
items.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Django (backend) and React (frontend), with Docker-based deployment, to manage inventory and logistics for I4 Lab.

items.topic: Real-Time Colonoscopy Image Segmentation for Edge Devices
items.description: Designed deep CNN models for real-time segmentation of colonoscopic images optimized to run on hardware-constrained platforms. Focused on accuracy and efficiency.

items.topic: Color Image Quantization using Swarm Intelligence Algorithms
items.description: Created a color image quantization tool using Artificial Bee Colony (ABC) and a newly proposed Spider Monkey Optimization (SMO) algorithm, integrating K-means for improved results.

items.topic: A New Method for Content-Aware Image Retargeting
items.description: Developed a content-aware image retargeting algorithm combining seam carving and scaling to resize images while preserving key content using an energy map.

items.topic: Image Processing on Drones to Detect Plant Pests
items.description: Utilizing Python's OpenCV library, developed a project to maneuver drones over plants in a house garden to detect pests.
Developed hardware using High-Level Synthesis (HLS) to multiply large matrices with complex elements on a Xilinx Zybo board.

items.topic: Hardware Implementation of HOG Feature Extraction on FPGA
items.description: Based on a research paper, designed hardware to extract Histogram of Oriented Gradients (HOG) features on a Xilinx Zybo board.

items.topic: Genetic Algorithm for Optimizing Parameters of a Deep ANN
items.description: Used a genetic algorithm to optimize the weights and biases of a deep Artificial Neural Network (ANN).
Developed a framework that enables dual-booting and firmware updates over the air for STM32 microcontrollers.
Developed an IoT project to remotely maintain a dairy farm's animals, involving Raspberry Pi boards and ESP8266 modules.

items.topic: AI Bot for Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe game
items.description: Developed an AI bot employing the Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning for Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe as the final project for a Game Theory course.
Wrote Verilog code for a simple CPU and implemented it on a Xilinx Spartan-6 board.
